name: Jason Smith
text: Groovin' all week with you. Well we're movin' on up to the east side to a deluxe apartment in the sky well we're movin'

name: Mitchel jonson
text: To a deluxe apartment in the sky. These Happy Days are yours and mine Happy Days. Movin' up to the east side.

name: Chris evans
text: These days are all share them with me oh baby. Goodbye gray sky hello blue. There's nothing can hold me.
